alert.note: Alert for Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 14 at 1:54AM CST until December 14 at 2:15AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM CST FOR EAST CENTRAL RAPIDES AND NORTHWESTERN AVOYELLES PARISHES... At 153 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Centerpoint, or near Effie, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Effie, Deville, Poland, Centerpoint and Ruby. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CST for central Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
